data.text:
Kitao Kuronuma

黒沼 喜多男（くろぬま きたお）, 黑沼喜多男

Gender: Male

Voice Actor: Takashi Matsuyama

Introduction

Edit

Sawako's father. A public servant. He dotes on Sawako and feels both happy and a bit sad as her surroundings become livelier. He reluctantly accepts her boyfriend, Shōta Kazehaya.

(Recently Edited: K K )
